item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 15-31-45-49-53, Powerball: 19

item.title: Texas man facing execution for fatally beating 13-month-old girl during 'exorcism'
item.description: A Texas man is facing execution for killing his girlfriend’s 13-month-old daughter in what the couple had said was part of an “exorcism” to expel a de...

item.title: Alabama to execute man for 1997 shooting death of store clerk
item.description: Alabama is preparing to execute a man convicted of killing a woman during a 1997 gas station robbery

item.title: Latinos in Memphis worry about possible immigration crackdown by Trump's crime task force
item.description: President Donald Trump has created a task force to fight crime in Memphis

item.title: Police gather for funeral of 3 Pennsylvania detectives ambushed by gunman
